Sail through storybook landscapes adorned with twinkling lights and snow-dusted rooftops as you journey along the enchanting Rhine River. From the charming canals of Amsterdam to the historic towns and vibrant markets of Germany, France, and Switzerland, each stop offers a joyful blend of old-world charm and holiday spirit. Wander through Europe’s most iconic Christmas markets, where the scent of spiced glühwein, roasted nuts, and fresh gingerbread fills the air. Discover handcrafted treasures, sample regional delicacies, and soak in centuries-old holiday traditions. Along the way, enjoy panoramic river views, medieval castles, and UNESCO-listed scenery, all wrapped in the warmth and wonder of the season. Whether you're sipping Alsatian wine in Strasbourg, listening to church bells in Dordrecht, or marveling at Cologne’s towering cathedral, this cruise brings the heart of European Christmas to life. Highlights Cologne’s Iconic Christmas Market Browse festive stalls beneath the breathtaking Cologne Cathedral, enjoying handcrafted gifts, twinkling lights, and the scent of mulled wine in the air. Scenic Sailing through the Middle Rhine Glide past fairytale castles, steep vineyard-covered hills, and the legendary Lorelei Rock in one of Europe's most scenic and storied river stretches. Strasbourg, France – The Capital of Christmas Discover one of Europe’s oldest and most magical Christmas markets, with Alsatian delicacies, handmade crafts, and festive charm around every corner. Rüdesheim’s Drosselgasse & Weihnachtsbier Soak in the cozy atmosphere of this charming wine town, sampling local holiday brews and strolling the lively, music-filled Drosselgasse. Amsterdam’s Canals in Holiday Glow Begin your journey in the heart of the Netherlands, where sparkling canals, historic neighborhoods, and festive markets set a magical tone for the cruise. With its state-of-the-art design, Scandinavian elegance, and spacious public areas, your ship is more than just a vessel—it’s your floating boutique hotel. Each Longship features a serene, understated aesthetic that reflects Viking’s commitment to comfort, functionality, and timeless design. Floor-to-ceiling windows in the lounge and restaurant offer panoramic views of the ever-changing scenery, while the open-air Aquavit Terrace provides a relaxed setting for al fresco dining or sunset cocktails along the riverbanks. Accommodations include a variety of stateroom categories, all with river views—many with full-size verandas or French balconies. Dining on board is a culinary journey of its own, with menus inspired by regional cuisine and international favorites. Enjoy complimentary wine and beer with lunch and dinner, as well as daily cultural enrichment programs, port talks, and live music in the lounge. With no casinos, no children under 18, and no unnecessary distractions, Viking offers a serene, immersive, and destination-focused experience. Whether you’re gliding past the castles of the Rhine, the vineyards of the Wachau, or the bustling quays of Budapest, your Longship ensures every moment on board is as memorable as your time ashore.
